ComicInfo.Title: The Plant; Ridin' That Train; The Mysterious Visitor; Sunday Funnies; Winter of '59

ComicInfo.Summary:
Franklin steps outside the apartment to clean the windows but he locks himself out.
The brothers decide to grow their own weed.
The brothers get new clothing to change their image after seeing their comic strip in High Times magazine.
Phineas gets a job at the local Volkswagen garage.
The landlady forbids any plants inside the apartment so Phineas starts growing his marijuana plants on the rooftop in kiddie swimming pools.
Fat Freddy calls the exterminator because of his serious roach problem.
Fat Freddy comes back to the apartment with weed as he was enlisted to but also with an electric train set.
Phineas and Fat Freddy disagree on what to watch on TV.
Fat Freddy digs a swimming pool in the backyard.
Phineas puts a beehive next to his marijuana plants to keep the neighborhood kids away.
The brothers clear their apartment of drugs after they hear what they think is a police dog barking outside their door.
Norbert, speaking to an audience of fellow policemen, introduces the cocaine-detecting dog.
It's Fat Freddy's turn to get a job since the brothers are out of food, money and drugs. He responds to a want ad for a fire alarm salesman position.
Franklin gives Fat Freddy a thousand dollars to score a pound of really good weed.
Fat Freddy recalls a New Year's Eve party Phineas threw at his parent's house in 1957.
